Package lesagervecchio.patchwork.display

Interface DisplayService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphicalDisplay, TextualDisplay
public sealed interface DisplayService permits TextualDisplay, GraphicalDisplay

    • moveCursor

      default void moveCursor(float x, float y)
      Move the cursor for the next to operate at a precise point of the screen (0, 0) based on corner N-W -1 on a coordinate to move the cursor at the center on this coordinate
      Parameters:
      x - : horizontal coordinate wanted for the cursor
      y - : vertical coordinate wanted for the cursor
